contents: You sometimes have to let people off the bus during your journey in life...not because you don't love them but because they are a distraction towards your growth!
There’s little growth and progression without learning and reflection
Setbacks allow us to take a step back and look at the view from a whole.
You will be a different person after the storm, because the storm will heal you from your perfection.
Would God be a frequent contact or an in case of emergency in your phone? If he is only an in case of emergency, he will you in different emergencies so he can be frequently contacted.
The only true end of love is spiritual growth or human evolution.
The greatest thing in this world is not so much where we stand as in what direction we are moving.
The day you start trusting the people who think you are right, more than the people who are actually right, you are on your way down.
When it comes to the core of who we are, it takes incredible effort to shift more than one standard deviation from the mean of your life.
Someone once told me that we move when it becomes less painful than staying where we are".
Everyone grows but not everyone becomes mature.
I want to be as idle as I can, so that my soul may have time to grow.

Mr. J.L.B Matekoni," she asked, "do you think that our souls grow as we get older?"He did not answer immediately, but when he did, she thought his answer quite perfect. "Yes," he said. "Our souls get wider. They grow like the branches of a tree--growing outwards. And more birds come and make their homes in these branches. And sing a bit more." He stopped and looked a little awkward. "I'm talking nonsense, Mma.""You're not," she said.

That’s the bittersweet joy of ministry. We see people healed, and then we watch them move on in victory. Sometimes, it means saying goodbye. We must learn to celebrate as our fledgling birds spread their wings and fly into freedom, even if that flight pattern takes them far away from us.
Young, healthy communities can afford to roll the dice.
